Lyrics 

This is where your sanity gives in / and love begins
never lose your grip / don't trip / don't fall / you'll lose it all
the sweetest way to die
it lies deep inside / you can not hide / it's the meanest fire
oh, it's a strange desire / you can not lie / that's a needless fight
This is where your sanity gives in / and love begins
never lose your grip / don't trip / don't fall / you'll lose it all
the sweetest way yo die
when your blood runs dry / you're paralyzed / it will eat your mind
did you hold it back / it comes to you in slow attacks / it's the meanest fire




my (free) audio player is AIMP2
for mor information: <a href=" http://www.aimp.ru" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.aimp.ru</a>


FLAC stands for Free Lossless Audio Codec, an audio format similar to MP3, but lossless, meaning that audio is compressed in FLAC without any loss in quality.
 <a href=" http://flac.sourceforge.net" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://flac.sourceforge.net</a>


I found a nice freeware who checks the origin of flac (APE, SHN, WAV and LPAC)
and can determine -in most cases- whether the encoding is lossless or not. (transcoded from other lossy, for example MP3 audio source).
 If not, the 'lossless' file is fake.
 
The software name is---Audiochecker
and you can download it from: <a href=" http://www.dester.hu/English/home_e.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.dester.hu/English/home_e.html</a>
This is a standalone software and therefore you don't need to install it.
I made some experiments and it works.

this is my first torrent -you need to start somewhere
